functions.tag:
{
                pages:
                [
                  "[{\"text\":\"Silently I stood, looking at what I would carry with me till the end of time. Light breaking through the roof of leaves that served many purposes.
One of which  is to protect it's roots from drowning and secondly to quench it's thirst.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"That day it however had yet another purpose as it stood witness to a beautiful yet horrific sight.

Surrounded by silence and within that silence the cries of a baby lama being born or parrots looking for a partner.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"A cycle of life which both has a start as it has a end.
Beautiful as she laid between the flowers and grass that wore the same colors as her eyes. Eyes that were beautiful but corrupted as the legends says.

It's the Grok that wears green eyes.\"}]"
                ],
                title:"Her green eyes",
                author:"Unknown Villager",
                display:{Lore:["A story written by a previous or current resident."]}
              }

{
                pages:
                [
                  "[{\"text\":\"It's been the second moon in my trial of Grok and I can slowly feel my senses coming back to me. If not what I wrote would have been gibberish. Or has it been the third moon?
I think i lost track of time 4 moons ago. But i am getting my sense of time back.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"The urge to eat raw fish diminishes too. Cooked are how I like them now.

With some moons I might be able to return home, back to my family and maybe we can sail out on the ships that will build the new world to the west.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"City of origins is what they are going to call it... Weirdly a stranger visited me 9 moons ago. He said it was already created.



How long have I been here?

 \"}]"
                ],
                title:"Trial of Grok",
                author:"Nameless Exile",
                display:{Lore:["A story on how one experiences the trial of Grok."]}
              }
